nodes.text: Chagar IX was a world located in the galaxy. It was the homeworld of stormtrooper Sergeant Kreel, and fell under the control of the Galactic Empire in Kreel's youth.

The culture of Chagar IX primarily revolved around its fighting pits, which saw those too poor to afford seats in the stands forced to fight in the pits themselves as gladiators. Many individuals died in the arena, including Kreel's father, mother, and many of his acquaintances. Kreel himself survived once stormtroopers of the Galactic Empire's 501st Legion arrived on Chagar IX. The Empire toppled the overlords of the pits in a day, and went on to close the arenas down and give jobs to the population. Kreel ultimately joined the Imperial Academy and the Stormtrooper Corps.
